item.description:
“Night at the Millyard Museum” Fundraiser
Thursday, November 18, 2010
5:00 p.m.-9:00 p.m.
$25 - $35 Family - MHA members receive a $5 discount

Featuring jazz by the Jared Steer Trio

Click here for latest details!

Join us for an evening of fun at the Millyard Museum with food, drink, music, a silent auction and more. Meet some of Manchester's most interesting historical characters! Come as you are, or (if you are feeling daring and imaginative) come dressed as your favorite historical character!Proceeds benefit the educational programs of the Manchester Historic Association, a charitable nonprofit organization with the mission to collect, preserve and share Manchester's history.
item.name: "Night at the Millyard Museum" Fundraiser
